ROOT:
-- DaoT_WorkflowHistory_D5_SelCnt -- 2014/7/18 日立 太郎 SELECT COUNT(*) FROM [T_WorkflowHistory]
WHERE AND [WorkflowControlNo] = @WorkflowControlNoAND [WorkflowControlNo] IS NULL AND [WorkflowControlNo] LIKE @WorkflowControlNo_Like AND [HistoryNo] = @HistoryNoAND [HistoryNo] IS NULL AND [HistoryNo] LIKE @HistoryNo_Like AND [WfPositionId] = @WfPositionIdAND [WfPositionId] IS NULL AND [WfPositionId] LIKE @WfPositionId_Like AND [WorkflowNo] = @WorkflowNoAND [WorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [WorkflowNo] LIKE @WorkflowNo_Like AND [FromUserId] = @FromUserIdAND [FromUserId] IS NULL AND [FromUserId] LIKE @FromUserId_Like AND [FromUserInfo] = @FromUserInfoAND [FromUserInfo] IS NULL AND [FromUserInfo] LIKE @FromUserInfo_Like AND [ActionType] = @ActionTypeAND [ActionType] IS NULL AND [ActionType] LIKE @ActionType_Like AND [ToUserId] = @ToUserIdAND [ToUserId] IS NULL AND [ToUserId] LIKE @ToUserId_Like AND [ToUserInfo] = @ToUserInfoAND [ToUserInfo] IS NULL AND [ToUserInfo] LIKE @ToUserInfo_Like AND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] = @ToUserPositionTitlesIdAND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] IS NULL AND [ToUserPositionTitlesId] LIKE @ToUserPositionTitlesId_Like AND [NextWfPositionId] = @NextWfPositionIdAND [NextWfPositionId] IS NULL AND [NextWfPositionId] LIKE @NextWfPositionId_Like AND [NextWorkflowNo] = @NextWorkflowNoAND [NextWorkflowNo] IS NULL AND [NextWorkflowNo] LIKE @NextWorkflowNo_Like AND [ReserveArea] = @ReserveAreaAND [ReserveArea] IS NULL AND [ReserveArea] LIKE @ReserveArea_Like AND [ReplyDeadline] = @ReplyDeadlineAND [ReplyDeadline] IS NULL AND [ReplyDeadline] LIKE @ReplyDeadline_Like AND [StartDate] = @StartDateAND [StartDate] IS NULL AND [StartDate] LIKE @StartDate_Like AND [AcceptanceDate] = @AcceptanceDateAND [AcceptanceDate] IS NULL AND [AcceptanceDate] LIKE @AcceptanceDate_Like AND [AcceptanceUserId] = @AcceptanceUserIdAND [AcceptanceUserId] IS NULL AND [AcceptanceUserId] LIKE @AcceptanceUserId_Like AND [AcceptanceUserInfo] = @AcceptanceUserInfoAND [AcceptanceUserInfo] IS NULL AND [AcceptanceUserInfo] LIKE @AcceptanceUserInfo_Like AND [EndDate] = @EndDateAND [EndDate] IS NULL AND [EndDate] LIKE @EndDate_Like
